cu.explanation_en: Setting the MNC to 1000 exceeds the valid range (0-999), causing PLMN configuration errors and network registration failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the power ramping step to 100 exceeds the valid range (0-3), leading to improper RACH procedure handling and UE access failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將功率斜坡步長設定為 100 超過有效範圍 (0-3)，導致 RACH 程序處理不當，並造成 UE 接入失敗。
